_sText:
HELLO

I decided to make V2 out of my previous map, because it had alot of bugs and things that bothered me, so I fixed alot of stuff to made it work better.
Added more into it, so this wouldn't be just fix of the map, but other version.

NEW
Hidden bar room. Lots of secret areas. Easier to go through chimney (No more crouching needed).
Smoother car drop. Fixed textures on walls and retextured boxes. Added more realism look for the house. And so on... See for yourself, hope you like it. :D

SPAWN POINTS
Terrorists - Spawn at the mountains. 
Counter terrorists - Spawn from the main building.

OBJECTIVE
The basic idea is for the terrorists to plant the bomb on "sauna" area (A) on the map and completely ruin the nice vacation OR just kill everybody and take over.
Counter terrorists have to protect the sauna from demolition by all cost!

INFO
This map has lots of new secret places all over the map, by mastering em, you have an advantage, such as invisible bridge, invisible walls, breakable walls etc...
Based on 8-8 matches, but holds 40 players limit, if you don't have any friends to play with, (or it's just me) don't you worry this map is bot friendly.

Happy Gaming!
